element.definition: Accession Number is an identifier related to some aspect of imaging workflow and data management. Usage may vary across different institutions.  See for instance [IHE Radiology Technical Framework Volume 1 Appendix A](http://www.ihe.net/uploadedFiles/Documents/Radiology/IHE_RAD_TF_Rev13.0_Vol1_FT_2014-07-30.pdf).
